events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size is incorrect and I no longer need the item.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for a money back on a purchase.
Your refund request has been assigned to one of our customer service agents who will assist you shortly.
Hello! I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket. I'd be happy to assist you with that today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Thank you for your help. My order number is 987654321 and the jacket is still in its original packaging, unopened and unworn.
We have verified your order and condition of the item. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
I appreciate your prompt response and the prepaid label. I will ship the jacket tomorrow and look forward to my refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and are satisfied with how the refund process was handled. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for contacting customer support. Your refund case is now closed. Have a great day!
We have sent you a survey link to gather your feedback on your experience with our support team regarding your refund.
